org.apereo.cas.web.flow

类 AuthenticationExceptionHandlerAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.webflow.action.AbstractAction
      • org.apereo.cas.web.flow.AuthenticationExceptionHandlerAction
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean, org.springframework.webflow.execution.Action

    public class AuthenticationExceptionHandlerAction
extends org.springframework.webflow.action.AbstractAction
    Performs two important error handling functions on an AuthenticationException raised from the authentication layer:
    1. Maps handler errors onto message bundle strings for display to user.
    2. Determines the next webflow state by comparing handler errors against errors in list order. The first entry that matches determines the outcome state, which is the simple class name of the exception.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0.0

      • getPredefinedHandledExceptions

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Exception>> getPredefinedHandledExceptions()
        Gets predefined handled exceptions. with latter handlers.
        返回:
        the predefined handled exceptions

      • setErrors

        public void setErrors(java.util.List<java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Exception>> errors)
        Sets the list of custom exceptions that this class knows how to handle.

        This implementation adds the provided list of exceptions to the default list or just returns if the provided list is empty.

        This implementation relies on Spring's property source configurer, SpEL, and conversion service infrastructure facilities to convert and inject the collection from cas properties.

        This method is thread-safe. It should only be called by the Spring container during application context bootstrap or unit tests.

        参数:
        errors - List of errors in order of descending precedence.

      • getErrors

        public java.util.Set<java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Exception>> getErrors()

      • containsCustomErrors

        public final boolean containsCustomErrors()
        Package-private helper method to aid in testing.
        返回:
        true if any custom errors have been added, false otherwise.

      • setMessageBundlePrefix

        public void setMessageBundlePrefix(java.lang.String prefix)
        Sets the message bundle prefix appended to exception class names to create a message bundle key for that particular error.
        参数:
        prefix - Prefix appended to exception names.

      • handle

        public java.lang.String handle(java.lang.Exception e,
                               org.springframework.webflow.execution.RequestContext requestContext)
        Maps an authentication exception onto a state name. Also sets an ERROR severity message in the message context.
        参数:
        e - Authentication error to handle.
        requestContext - the spring context
        返回:
        Name of next flow state to transition to or

      • handleAuthenticationException

        protected java.lang.String handleAuthenticationException(org.apereo.cas.authentication.AuthenticationException e,
                                                         org.springframework.webflow.execution.RequestContext requestContext)
        Maps an authentication exception onto a state name equal to the simple class name of the AuthenticationException.getHandlerErrors() with highest precedence. Also sets an ERROR severity message in the message context of the form [messageBundlePrefix][exceptionClassSimpleName] for for the first handler error that is configured. If no match is found, is returned.
        参数:
        e - Authentication error to handle.
        requestContext - the spring context
        返回:
        Name of next flow state to transition to or

      • handleAbstractTicketException

        protected java.lang.String handleAbstractTicketException(org.apereo.cas.ticket.AbstractTicketException e,
                                                         org.springframework.webflow.execution.RequestContext requestContext)
        Maps an AbstractTicketException onto a state name equal to the simple class name of the exception with highest precedence. Also sets an ERROR severity message in the message context with the error code found in RootCasException.getCode(). If no match is found, is returned.
        参数:
        e - Ticket exception to handle.
        requestContext - the spring context
        返回:
        Name of next flow state to transition to or
